website_summaries.verdict: A solid camera that allows novices to take pictures they can be proud of after only a little bit of practice.
pros: The Smart Auto feature analyzes the environment to help ensure perfect shots for inexperienced users
The camera also has a live panoramic view, remote viewfinder, smart filters, WiFi connectivity, and wireless auto backup
cons: There is a slight delay between shots, which can make taking rapid pictures in changing conditions a little bit of a challenge

customer_reviews.title: Its lite in weight & it takes very good pictures. Its great
customer_reviews.text: Impressive !! I didn't expect too much from a $ 180.00 camera, but it surprised me. Its lite in weight & it takes very good pictures. Its great !!
customer_reviews.author: Brian N.

customer_reviews.title: Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: The Samsung WB1100F camera is value for money, particularly up against higher end cameras. The Samsung WB1100F Pro features include: 1. Good rubber grip 2. Wi-Fi and NFC connectivity 3. Durable build quality 4. 1cm macro mode 5. Built in assistance guide As for the cons: 1. The device lacks orientation sensor 2. 720p video recording 3. Flash portraits have a color cast 4. Slow continuous shooting
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I needed. I can send directly to my phone through an app, Wi-Fi, email, facebook all instantly. No longer needed a cord to upload to a computer! And the picture quality is great! For a refurbished camera, I can't even tell it was used!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Piz

customer_reviews.title: Features galore.. wifi and app are amazing.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the camera a lot but so far I'm very impressed with the Samsung Camera app it will allow you to remotely use the viewfinder with your phone screen and allow you to take a picture with your phone It will also zoom using your phone. Of course your phone must have wifi but all phones have that anymore. This could be used as a remote spying camera if needed. Also the app allows easy transfer of pictures from camera to phone or from phone to camera. The NFC fea ture works well with my Samsung galaxy s5. Camera takes great photos as well. This is a review based on the refurbished unit. Just like new, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: ... this camera because the reviews for it were so amazing. I was pretty disappointed though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because the reviews for it were so amazing. I was pretty disappointed though. First of all the zoom function broke on my second use. I had to send it back to Samsung to get it fixed. They fixed it fairly quickly. Once the zoom was fixed it does zoom in pretty far and takes decent pictures when zoomed in pretty far. I dont like trying to navigate through the different functions Trying to find the best shoot mode. The panoramic photo option is pretty cool but most times my phobe takes better pictures than the camera
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C

customer_reviews.title: A bulky fair digital camera
customer_reviews.text: It may be a bulky camera for it not to do photos like the professional ones. It is a very well fair equipped bridge camera that covers the basic needs of urban photography while traveling. Although night photography is not my strongest quality a tripod became my best friend while taking photos at night during Christmas (way to many lights to catch as memoirs). I definitely enjoyed. What I don't like is the size and the fact that I can't change the lens if needed. But other than that it's great for the family-vacation-amateur photo sessions. Besides the seller delivered right on time!
customer_reviews.author: ATeam21

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this camera. Wish I'd gone a different way.  Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this camera. It's really hard to get the connection to a Samsung phone to work (which is the main reason I purchased a Samsung camera - to play nice with my Samsung phone) The software is not intuitive and is hard to figure out. The pictures are pretty good quality, but do me no good sitting on the camera. I need them transferred to my phone or computer.
customer_reviews.author: MominSchool

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an amateur photographer and this is a great starter camera. I love that I can take pictures and then transfer them to my Samsung phone with the wifi connection. I have used the email and facebook connection a few times but I'm more into instagram so I just download the pictures to my camera and then upload from my camera. The zoom capabilities are fantastic. If you're looking for a good starter camera, I would recommend this one
customer_reviews.author: pattiecakes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful deep color just as pic/So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for 16 yr old female. So far it works great and she uses it daily. Looks exactly as pictured. Beautiful deep red color. Arrived packaged very well. Comes with standard little shoe string type hand strap. I purchased a better hand strap but she likes it the way it came.
customer_reviews.author: Book5

customer_reviews.title: Samsung WB1100F 16.2MP CCD Smart WiFi & NFC Digital Camera with 35x Optical Zoom
customer_reviews.text: Dec 14, 2014 I bought this for my son to give to his girl friend for xmas. It is now 11/05/19 and she is still loving this camera. She said it takes a super nice clear picture. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Very poor clarity. Went on a 25 mile hike in ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor clarity. Went on a 25 mile hike in Glacier National Park. My friends used their smart phones and the pictures are significantly clearer with many more shooting options. Difficult to get moving photos (water, lots of bodies of water there) even after playing with the settings. Also when camera was zoomed it would just shut off when capture button was pressed. Very upset so much money was wasted when I could of just paid for a phone upgrade which would have also been lighter to pack in addition to my 50lb backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera! It is the same year as my Samsung Galaxy S4 phone and they are very compatible. There is this cool feature that I can link up with my phone, walk outside, and my mother can see what I am talking about without her leaving the house. That is priceless. Still figuring out how the little things that make picture taking more to what I see with the naked eye. Love this part of my journey in life lol. YouTube also helped to get me going. Great price, great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Terri F.

customer_reviews.title: Best digital camera I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: This camera pack a lot of punch. The optical zoom is fantastic and the smart capabilities are super convenient. My phone doesn't have NFC functions so I haven't been able to test that part out but everything else works as described and now I'm taking the best pictures of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Brown

customer_reviews.title: Get it right please
customer_reviews.text: this is not so much a review of the camera as a review of Deal Stop. We could not even use the camera because we could not turn it on. The camera package included the wrong battery-not a SLB-10A but a BP7A. The BP7A battery is smaller and not as powerful. How could the camera be tested with the wrong battery. When we get the correct battery, we will update our review.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around camera
customer_reviews.text: The photos look very professional. I use it to record the make-up jobs I do and the resolution is great. Both the clients and I are really pleased with how they look. The only complaint is that it doesn't have a forced flash.
customer_reviews.author: L. Texel

customer_reviews.title: fell in love with the camera till the battery and the 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: fell in love with the camera till the battery and the 2 additional batteries I bought will not hold a charge. I have not had the camera long and now I cannot take a photo with it. Camera always says the battery is not charged. Quit working during a bridal shower for my best friend. Very upsetting
customer_reviews.author: sharon brown

customer_reviews.title: Sweet camera...no battery compartment!
customer_reviews.text: Took this camera to Israel with me this month. It takes great pics and was very easy to use. It also has a solid feel which I enjoyed. My only concern was that it has no battery compartment/option. That was my fault though for not checking prior to purchasing this model. It kept dying on me...fortunately I had a portable battery charger with me!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good Digital Camera for this price range
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter as she wanted a good digital camera. Has a lot features and very easy to use even without the manual. Took me like two minutes and I showing her how to use different features. She did have a small complaint about the speed of the camera but said is wasn't that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Russell F Bradley

customer_reviews.title: i think it works AND LOOKS like new. the 100 pages of instruction
customer_reviews.text: mine was refurbished. i think it works AND LOOKS like new. the 100 pages of instruction. a bit much. am still trying to figure all the buttons. will eventually ask for help. so far pixture are great. i can forward to fb or email. i think i should be able to send to tv,since i have a samsung tiv. also. overall i am happy.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: (she is 12) and she had found it easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my daughter for a recent trip. We looked at several different cameras, and finally settled on this one. She is a beginning photographer, (she is 12) and she had found it easy to use. She likes that it has editing tools and filters and good zoom. She particularly likes the grip on it; says it's easy to hold. She likes the pop-up flash and it takes great videos. A good beginning camera:)
customer_reviews.author: kaleighgirl2133

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hobbying.
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and video but does not auto focus when zooming in and out. This makes the zoom feature difficult to work with. I am self learning the use of this camera. I have a Panasonic Lumix compact that does auto focus with the zoom feature. For the price I paid for this camera it is still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kickd

customer_reviews.title: ZOOM NOT GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera but the zoom leaves a little to be desired. Unfortunately no attachments are available on the market for this type of camera. I love the WiFi feature and my boyfriend downloaded an app on his Samsung smartphone to transfer the pictures easily. Overall I wud recommend another camera, esp one where attachments are available.
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality. Just use your smartphone. It's better and easier.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible quality. The pictures are terrible in resolution even at the "best" quality setting. Also the picture takes about 2-3 seconds to snap after pressing the button so useless unless you are trying to capture something very, very still. Asking for a refund. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent camera! I am very happy with everything about this camera. As a photographer I wanted something that would exceed my expectations, and that I could afford and this was it! Delivery came very fast. You can see the results from my camera, at my website [...]
customer_reviews.author: Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Camera With Excellent Wi-Fi Options
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift, but the recipient was delighted. She especially likes the built-in Wi-Fi which makes sharing photos to a phone or computer incredibly fast and easy. There's also an iOS app that lets you use an iPhone as a shutter for remote photography (GREAT for group photos - we tried this out!). Excellent photo quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Smart camera - dumb user
customer_reviews.text: The camera is too "smart" constantly adjusting...I need to read and look up youtube demos. Some of the flash photos have a bit of red in the color. It is heaver than expected and cannot be concealed at concerts...OK (sue me) anyway the dog doesn't mind the flash.
customer_reviews.author: GrandMaRain

customer_reviews.title: In love with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with my camera! I've had this camera before but it was stolen and I've wanted to replace it for some time. Looks brand new! It even arrived a day early which really makes me happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kirabear1993

customer_reviews.title: A Dealership favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of these now to use to take pictures of vehicles for my dealership and I am about to order my fourth. They are great little cameras that hold up well to intense daily use. These are our go to cameras for a dealership that shots an average of 27 photos per car and over 60 cars a day. Never a problem and the battery lasts plenty long.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Webb

customer_reviews.title: Love this easy to use gem
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera, it's lightweight yet has similar options to a SLR camera. Photos are clear, even when blown up. Easy to move from camera to computer and if I can get over my laziness, I might even be able to use the Bluetooth option to transfer them :)... Highly recommend. Easy to charge battery and it's nice and compact, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: goobergurl

customer_reviews.title: So lightweight but incredibly well made and easy to handle.
customer_reviews.text: I have taken this with me on motorcycle rides. I have taken some of the best pictures with it. I am a camera/picture hound... this camera is absolutely one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: grrrr says Tigger

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this camera and I get to download the photos directly to my iPhone. I thought it would be a problem because I don't have a Samsung phone but it was really easy and fast and I love this camera. I am so glad I purchased it! The pictures are clear and crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Chamicqua

customer_reviews.title: but I'm absolutely in love with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional photographer, but I'm absolutely in love with this camera. Takes great pictures (the attached picture was made with the zoom function from a couple feet away) and is easy to use. Still learning the camera, but can definitely say it's worth the money! Only downfall is you can't buy additional lenses, which, fora hobby photographer, are a plus but not necessary I'd say.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a Father's Day gift for my husband, who was loathe to give up his 35mm SLR. Needless to say, he loves the quality of the photos and the ease of use. The hand grip is very comfortable for him to hold which is a plus as he's wheelchair bound.
customer_reviews.author: Shellie Dunn

customer_reviews.title: This camera is not that great. Even using a tripod it takes blurry pictures ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not that great. Even using a tripod it takes blurry pictures sometimes. It's not that easy to figure out either since it comes with no manual and you have to download it if you want it. By the way it's about 170 pages.
customer_reviews.author: DANNY T.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a camera that takes really nice pictures for when I go on trips to places like Ensenada! I'm not a professional when it comes to cameras but this camera has amazing quality! It's got everything I need and I'm happy! It's exactly what I was looking for when I ordered it online.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Curiel Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality photos for the price of the camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price! The photos are pretty amazing and I love that you can just download an app to your phone and transfer your photos from the camera onto your phone! Quality of pictures are gorgeous for the price you pay for this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Trang Le

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. However, for fast pictures, the camera takes a second, sometimes two to click. This was problematic when shooting wildlife.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: when we travel she liked to be able to capture her own shots at ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional Photographer, I got this for my wife, when we travel she liked to be able to capture her own shots at times, but has no desire to be a pro, she wants more than a point and shoot.... Samsung done a nice job on this camera, I own nothing but Nikon Gear, this out performed the Nikon in it's class....
customer_reviews.author: Flyboy

customer_reviews.title: solid purchase. you won't regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: For a beginner type dslr it does a great job and produces amazing photos. Significantly cheaper than the high end cameras with almost exact quality. It is a Samsung after all. I expected nothing less than amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Phelps

customer_reviews.title: I really like this camera but I thought the pictures would me ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera but I thought the pictures would me more sharp. The zoom on the other hand is excellent im a beginner but I feel this is a great camera to start with.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!! Totally recommended
customer_reviews.text: Exelent camera! Totally recommended! It comes with a charger! Sorry for the photos, I couldn't focus them with my phones camera!
customer_reviews.author: anita noguera

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the instructions had words in them. Other than that I like it. Went to try it out at the zoo. Nice pictures. Pleased with the quality of the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Arocho

customer_reviews.title: Neat Camera
customer_reviews.text: Still learning how to use this. Takes great pictures, but instructions are hard to understand.
customer_reviews.author: SueBee

customer_reviews.title: we liked it so much we bought another for our vacation ...
customer_reviews.text: we liked it so much we bought another for our vacation and I use one at work great price
customer_reviews.author: brad

customer_reviews.title: She "borrowed" this camera and I have not seen it since because she fell in love with it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this camera for myself. My 19 year old daughter decided to take a photography class at college. She "borrowed" this camera and I have not seen it since because she fell in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Very good camera. I bought it as a gift and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera. I bought it as a gift and they just loved it.
customer_reviews.author: mechanic

customer_reviews.title: best camera ever!
customer_reviews.text: The best camera I've owned in a long time! For the price you get incredible quality photos and being able to take the pictures with the so on my phone is great! Now i can be in family pictures
customer_reviews.author: renee

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Camera was easy to use and took very good pictures. The only complaint is the battery life was shorter than I have experienced with other cameras. I would recommend you buy an additional battery to make sure you have enough battery to take your pictures. We were in France and the battery would not last all day and we had limited access to facilities to recharge the battery.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Camera
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for her birthday and she was not disappointed. The camera itself is stunning as are the pictures it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Dubois

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. Links to your Samsung phone and shares pictures easily. Takes great pictures too.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money !!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, could me more satisfied.. Does everything I need and the wife is happy with it. Although and full zoom the image may get a little blurry but I can get a good shot from a block away( city).
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pics, zoom, uploads
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a trip to Europe last month and love this camera! The pics are clear and sharp (very few were out of focus) and the zoom is incredible. Downloaded the app to my Samsung phone and connects easily to transfer pics. When the wifi connection was strong, easily posted pics directly from the camera to Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: alexonthemove

customer_reviews.title: I liked the product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Good resolution and Easy to use. The wifi feature is awesome. I can also transfer them to my phone with just a 'bump'!. After messing around with the manual settings, I found that this camera offers a surprising clarity for macro shots when the correct settings are turned on. Recommend the product!!
customer_reviews.author: James Coleman

customer_reviews.title: It takes great photos and has an option to email photos as ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my teenage daughter and she loves it. It takes great photos and has an option to email photos as well as an option to upload them directly to Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Success
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my adult sons birthday because he records car drifting events. He loves it! He is pretty "techie" so I'd say he can be hard to please but all I've heard were good reviews from him.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: It's a much more advanced camera and I'm I am very pleased with it's updated options
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased to replace the one I used to have. It's a much more advanced camera and I'm I am very pleased with it's updated options. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: N. W.  Hope

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Takes great pictures, not too heavy around my neck(comes with shoulder/neck strap). Only drawback is that it takes a few seconds after taking a picture for you to take another shot.
customer_reviews.author: Joyous Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! being able to immediately upload photos to Facebook and other social sites is awesome. Love the 35x zoom. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: We do really like our camera
customer_reviews.text: We do really like our camera. We took it on vacation and so far have had very good results. We just need to learn how to use all of the different setting. We went on a cruise and took pictures of the beautiful water. They came out very good!
customer_reviews.author: Patsy

customer_reviews.title: Most appreciated gift ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it has not put it down she took it out of the box did not read any instruction lol and started clicking away and started posting pics to Facebook with not difficulty
customer_reviews.author: kwmimi79

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised by good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm very pleased. Camera is a great quality. And I was actually worried it being refurbished what I would end up getting. But it looks and operates like a brand new one.
customer_reviews.author: dwight bo burnett

customer_reviews.title: but I def like it. Easy to use even for an amateur ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it a handful of times so far, but I def like it. Easy to use even for an amateur like me. The Wifi comes in handy. Nice camera for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic camera for the price. The Samsung WB1100F produces fantastic still and video. The 35x zoom is awesome! Battery life averages 90 minutes but I purchased four extra batteries. I just ordered a second Samsung WB1100F. I do a lot of hiking and climbing into abandoned structures and this camera is light weight, making my gear bag lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Chevi Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: She is quickly learning how to best use it in varying light conditions and takes great ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my wife as a Christmas gift. She absolutely loves photography and loves this camera. She is quickly learning how to best use it in varying light conditions and takes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: htg1969

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing it has everything that you need the camera to have and do. it was definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mojo69

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I have taken a few pictures and they are wonderful. I am a pure amateur but this is easy to work worth. My son graduates from boot camp this week and can't wait to try the zoom lens. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera to hold
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera to hold; a little bulky for travel. Great shots on zoom. It takes a bit of study to use well. Does not download easily to my Mac computer (which was one of my main desires.)
customer_reviews.author: Sunwillrise

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Item is not functioning. Please buyers beware . Item did get to me on time but it is was not in a working condition
customer_reviews.author: franci

customer_reviews.title: Not the one for me
customer_reviews.text: I did not find this camera useful. It is pretty bulky and my pictures were not clear. I was looking for something with a good zoom, which it does have, but the pictures were not clear when you zoomed in past a certain point, defeating the purpose. I returned the camera. It may be good for it's price point, I have not compared it with other similarly priced items.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Good

customer_reviews.title: A real go to camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. So far it has been pretty easy to use. Too bad they do not include a real Operating Manual. Going on line is inconvient. But the Camera is great. Camera is truly a Smart camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Bee

customer_reviews.title: Share features don't work
customer_reviews.text: Takes great video and pictures but the share features don't work because Dropbox, YouTube, picasa and Facebook stopped support for Samsung Smart Cameras after updating their security
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase although I need to read through ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase although I need to read through the instructions. I am disappointed that I had to go online to download the info.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled this camera connects direcrly to wifi for easy upload and editing.
customer_reviews.author: artopolis

customer_reviews.title: ORDER VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I RECIEVED MY ORDER AND I'M VERY HAPPY FOR THE SAMSUNG WB1100F . GOOD JOB FOR THE TEAM AND THE COSTOMER
customer_reviews.author: AMOHRY RAPHA-L

customer_reviews.title: Picture Kinda Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get the camera in just in time for a concert. However-- sometimes the focus doesn't focus very well, and the shutter time is kind of slow. These things very well could be user error though. All in all, it's a good camera!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for my wife. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my wife. She loves it. Only improvement I might suggest is if it had a view finder in addition to the screen.
customer_reviews.author: SR989ER

customer_reviews.title: I definitely was not disappointed. It is perfect for nature photos and landscape
customer_reviews.text: After doing many comparisons in price, specs and quality- I finally caved and bought this camera. I definitely was not disappointed. It is perfect for nature photos and landscape. Then to top it off it offers a variety of setting to take other pictures. Pictures are clear, zoom is great and the samsung apps make it easy to do more with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: great dealio
customer_reviews.text: Even though it is marked as certified refurbished some of these, some I am sure are like mine, new with QC visual defects [like a scuffed lcd screen]. A great deal at a great price. The photos are very nice and so is the video. The sensors one flaw in my opinion, is in bright [and I mean bright] light is that you get a bar in the pic [see photo], other than that, I am loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Neohavock

customer_reviews.title: Finally...wish I'd bought it a long time ago!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I love it! Great price, product, and service.
customer_reviews.author: Spartacus Voltaire

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If it weren't for the slow switch time between taking shots, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mita Majumdar

customer_reviews.title: amazing item
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera that came with extra items. No issues what so ever and I had this for about a month. Bought it for my graphic design classes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is so easy to use; I'm a novice, my last camera was a bit intricate and too small. This has a nice grip to it, and takes great pics. Very glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Carole A Murphy

customer_reviews.title: ... for big family trip to New York and absolutely LOVE it! Got some great pictures with it and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for big family trip to New York and absolutely LOVE it! Got some great pictures with it and transferring them to my phone has been soooo easy!
customer_reviews.author: latinadina

customer_reviews.title: The wifi option is amazing and extremely functional
customer_reviews.text: LOOOOOVE this camera! The wifi option is amazing and extremely functional! My only complaint would be the shutter speed... I have a 1 yr old that I try to take pics of. But the action pic setting does help with that!
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: ... cap that is attached to the camera broke rather easily, but the camera itself is fabulous - great ...
customer_reviews.text: the lens cap that is attached to the camera broke rather easily, but the camera itself is fabulous - great for photos and videos. Sports shots are not as good as my Canon Rebel, but this was not bought for sports pics. Lower mark is solely for the lens cap. it broke within a month of getting the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J. Evans

product_meta.title: Samsung WB1100F 16.2MP CCD Smart WiFi & NFC Digital Camera with 35x Optical Zoom, 3.0" LCD and 720p HD Video (Red)
product_meta.description:
Color:Red| Style:BaseAdvanced NFC and Wi-Fi connectivity brings additional functionality to the WB1100F. The brand new "Tag & Go" feature allows the camera to connect to smartphones by simply tapping the two devices together. No manual set up is required, allowing users access to a host of features which make it easier to share photographic creations with friends and family, instantly.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Take brilliant photos of landscapes and more--and upload them immediately to your Facebook or Flickr account--with the Samsung WB1100F SMART Camera. This camera has a 16.2-megapixel CCD sensor and comes with a 22.3-millimeter ultra wide-angle lens. A Live Panorama feature lets you preview wide shots. Wi-Fi capability allows you to email photos or post them to a social network.

The WB1100F features a precision-cut 22.3-millimeter ultra-wide-angle lens. View larger.

With the LCD's improved contrast and color reproduction, you'll enjoy clearer image previews. (Shown in black)
View larger.

Samsung's Smart Filter lens effect delivers an artistic edge to your still shots and video. View larger.

Use Remote Viewfinder to frame a group photo or zoom in and out using your smartphone. (Shown in black)
View larger.

22.3-MILLIMETER ULTRA WIDE-ANGLE LENS
Great whether you're shooting a vast expanse of green space or a sprawling cityscape, the Samsung WB1100F SMART Camera features a precision-cut 22.3-millimeter ultra-wide-angle lens, allowing you to instantly cover a whole-horizon field of view. 

16.2-MEGAPIXEL CCD SENSOR FOR EXCEPTIONAL IMAGES
The WB1100F contains a 16.2-megapixel CCD sensor that is engineered to help you capture high-quality, low-noise images with ample pixels and excellent lighting. The CCD's sensitivity makes it possible to capture vivid, natural-looking, professional-quality photos, regardless of the shooting conditions. 

COMPOSE ON A BRILLIANT 3-INCH DISPLAY
On the back of the camera is a brilliant 3-inch HVGA display that automatically detects environmental illumination and adjusts the LCD brightness for optimal viewing. The camera body and display are designed to give you a firm grip for steady shots and playback. 

WI-FI CONNECTIVITY FOR EASY SHARING
Thanks to built-in Wi-Fi capability, the WB1100F makes it easy to post pictures and videos--along with comments--to Facebook, YouTube, Flickr, and other sites. You can also email files to friends and family members or use the Group Share function, which allows you to send images to up to four people simultaneously. The camera also comes with 2 GB of free Dropbox online storage or 50 GB if you also own a GALAXY smartphone. 

SHOOT HD-QUALITY MOVIES
Whether you're at the concert hall or a birthday party, grab the WB1100F to take 720p HD-quality MPEG video at 30 frames per second. 

SMART AUTO FOR SHARP SHOTS EVERY TIME
The Smart Auto feature automatically analyzes the current shooting environment and chooses the right mode to give you the best possible picture. 

LIVE PANORAMA TO CAPTURE LANDSCAPES AND MORE
With Samsung's Live Panorama function, you can capture a procession of gondolas gliding past a magnificent Venetian palace or other breathtaking scenes with a 180 degree panoramic image. This feature even allows you to preview the image on the LCD screen before you snap it. Just hold the shutter button and sweep across the scene. 

SMART FILTER FOR AN ARTISTIC LOOK
Samsung's Smart Filter lens effect delivers an artistic edge to your still shots and videos. The Miniature filter gives your subjects a miniaturized look, while the Vignetting filter provides a strong compositional contrast. A Fish-Eye filter gives your photos a circular fisheye feel. 

SAVE PHOTOS IN REAL TIME WITH AUTOSHARE
With Samsung's AutoShare feature, you can send photos instantly to an NFC-compatible smartphone or tablet--just as you're shooting them--over a Wi-Fi connection. This makes it easy to back up photos and share them wherever you are. 

SAMSUNG LINK TO CONNECT WITH OTHER DEVICES
Thanks to Samsung Link, you can connect this camera wirelessly with other nearby Samsung Link-enabled devices and share photos and videos or upload them to your web storage service. 

PHOTO BEAM TO SHARE PHOTOS WITH ONE TOUCH
Like other Samsung devices, the WB1100F features Photo Beam technology, which makes it a snap to share photos. Simply tap the camera on any NFC-compatible smartphone to automatically share whichever image you're currently viewing. 

TRANSFER FILES WITH PC AUTO BACKUP
Saving photos, video clips, and more to your computer is easy with the WB1100F. Just select the PC Auto Backup function and the camera will wirelessly transfer all of the files on the camera to your PC or Mac. 

SEND FILES USING MOBILE LINK, EVEN WITHOUT WI-FI
Based on NFC technology, Samsung's Mobile Link app lets you select and send photos or albums to a designated smartphone or tablet, even when you're away from a Wi-Fi hotspot, and without having to send the photos as a text message or an email. The app also lets you manage photos on your smartphone and save the changes automatically to the camera. 

REMOTE VIEWFINDER TO CONTROL CAMERA AT A DISTANCE
When you connect the camera to select smartphones, you can use the Remote ViewFinder app to turn your phone into a viewfinder. You can control your camera from up to 30 feet away and preview images, adjust camera settings, frame the scene, and tag the shot location--all from your phone. When you need to take a group shot with yourself in it, Remote ViewFinder makes it easy. 

PRODUCT DIMENSIONS
The Samsung WB1100F SMART Camera measures 3.41 by 4.90 by 3.78 inches (H x W x D) and weighs 1.02 pounds without the battery. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Samsung WB1100F SMART Camera, lithium-ion EA-SLB10A/WW battery, USB cable, power adapter, wrist strap, and quick start guide.

 WB1100F SMART CAMERA
AT A GLANCE:
 * 22.3-millimeter ultra wide-angle lens for landscapes and more
 * 16.2-megapixel CCD sensor for natural-looking photos
 * 3-inch HVGA LED display to frame your shots
 * Wi-Fi capability to post to Facebook and other online networks
 * 720p HD video recording

The 16.2-megapixel CCD sensor is engineered to help you capture high-quality, low-noise images with excellent light. View larger.

Samsung Link connects the camera wirelessly with other nearby Samsung Link-enabled devices. (Shown in black) View larger.

Built-in Wi-Fi makes it easy to post pictures and videos to social media sites. (Shown in black) View larger.
feature_bullets: Share your best photos instantly with Family and Friends with Built-in Wi-Fi with NFC
SMART features - Social Media Upload, E-mail, Photo beam, Direct Link, Mobile Link, PC Auto-backup, Remote Viewfinder, All Share
35x Optical Zoom for stunning long distance shots with ease
